name: Dynamic Insurance Pricing and Risk Management System

intents.name: Generate Risk Reports
intents.description: Creates comprehensive reports and dashboards that visualize risk assessments and predictive analytics for insurers.
examples: Generate a risk assessment report for the last quarter.
Show a dashboard of predictive analytics for premium strategies.
Visualize the risk levels of policyholders in urban areas.

miniAgents.name: Data Visualization Agent
miniAgents.scope: Generates detailed risk assessment reports and predictive analytics dashboards for insurers, providing insights into risk levels and premium strategies.

intents.name: Recommend Health Activities
intents.description: Offers personalized health activities to policyholders to help them lower their premium costs and reduce claims.
examples: What activities can I do to lower my insurance premium?
Suggest a fitness program for a 50-year-old policyholder.
How can regular checkups affect my insurance costs?

miniAgents.name: Health Incentives Agent
miniAgents.scope: Provides personalized health recommendations to policyholders aimed at reducing health risks and lowering insurance costs. Suggests activities like regular checkups and fitness programs.

intents.name: Detect Fraudulent Claims
intents.description: Analyzes submitted claims and associated data to identify anomalies and potential fraud.
examples: Is there any suspicious activity in the latest claim submission?
Analyze this medical report for inconsistencies.
Flag any anomalies in the financial data of this claim.

miniAgents.name: Fraud Detection Agent
miniAgents.scope: Utilizes anomaly detection techniques on financial reports, medical records, and claim history to identify and flag potentially fraudulent claims. Leverages Uptiqâ€™s financial anomaly detection for enhanced accuracy.

intents.name: Calculate Premium
intents.description: Determines the insurance premium based on the customer's risk score, adjusting dynamically as new data is received.
examples: Calculate the premium for a customer with a high-risk job.
How does a recent health checkup affect my premium?
What is the premium adjustment for a non-smoker?

miniAgents.name: Premium Calculation Agent
miniAgents.scope: Implements a point-based system where various risk factors contribute to a customer's score, leading to dynamic adjustments in insurance premiums. Continuously refines premium calculations based on new data.

intents.name: Generate Health Score
intents.description: Analyzes various data points such as lifestyle, job type, health habits, and location to produce a health score for insurance applicants.
examples: What is the health score for a 35-year-old office worker who smokes?
Assess the risk level for a policyholder with a history of heart disease.
How does living in a high-crime area affect my health score?

miniAgents.name: Risk Analysis Agent
miniAgents.scope: Collects and analyzes real-time data from policyholders, including lifestyle habits, job type, medical history, and location, to generate a comprehensive health score. Utilizes behavioral analytics and predictive modeling to assess risk levels.
